description: Project Hail Mary is Andy Weir's third novel written after 2011's The Martian and 2017's Artemis.

The novel centers on middle school-teacher-turned-astronaut Ryland Grace, who wakes up on a spaceship with no memory. He soon learns that he is the sole survivor on a desperate mission to save the Earth.

He starts recovering his memories slowly as he starts putting the pieces together to find out what has happened to complete his interstellar mission to save humanity. It is a fabulous story of sheer determination to survive using science and engineering against overwhelming odds.

The author is known for conducting extensive research for the sake of scientific accuracy, so this is also a great book to learn a thing or two about physics, astrobiology, and orbital mechanics. There's already a movie in the planning with Ryan Gosling starring.
